name: Just Asteroids
description:
This is the first of a series of games I want to create with Unity. This project in particular is to get a hang of the system and to see the steps of getting a game up here.

I want to thank Brackeys tutorials for helping me with learning how to code some of the logic of the game. You can find his YouTube page here: https://www.youtube.com/user/Brackeys.

Assets that I used:

  • Sprites: Kenny Space Shooter https://www.kenney.nl/assets/space-shooter-extension
  • Sprites: Brackeys Health Bar Tutorial https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BLfNP4Sc_iA&t=617s
  • Music: Humble Bundle Game Creator Bundle https://www.humblebundle.com/software/game-creator-software
  • Sounds: Used a program called Bfxr, which can be downloaded here: https://www.bfxr.net/

If you want more info on the build of this game, you can check out the Github repository here: https://github.com/andrewbatallones/asteroids_clone
